name: Speaker Identifiction System
detail: Indentification Software was developed for the recognition of the current speaker from the database of different speakers, based on their individual speech characteristics.
Feature Extraction was performed using MFCC and after that LBGVQ method was used for Feature Matching in training and testing purpose.

name: Brain Computer Interface Design for EEG signal
detail: A BCI (Brain computer Interface) software was developed to receive informations from a human brain (EEGs signals) and perform task by detecting pattern after processing.
Neurosky mindwave device was used for recording EEG signals of brain, after processing then pattern detection of eye blinksâ€™ and other events was used to control computer.

name: Simulation Android App for Mechanics problems.
detail: This app development work was done for visualizing real life simple mechanics events easily on android phone by inbuild simulation engine.
This work was done with the help of openGL ES 2.0 API for 2D Graphical Simulation and BOX2D API for Physics Engine.
